name: Truffle-Infused Artisan Popcorn
description: Experience the ultimate snack indulgence with our Truffle-Infused Artisan Popcorn. Each fluffy kernel is hand-popped in small batches and delicately tossed with premium white truffle oil and a sprinkle of sea salt. The result is a savory, aromatic treat that elevates any movie night or gathering. Perfect for gifting or savoring solo, this gourmet popcorn delivers a rich, earthy flavor profile without artificial additives or preservatives. Enjoy an upscale twist on a classic favorite—pure, simple luxury in every bite.

attributes.allergen_info: Contains dairy. Made in a facility that processes nuts.
attributes.ingredients: Non-GMO popcorn, white truffle oil, sea salt, butter
